name: Reverse-dyed tote
description: A black and brown soft-sided bag with leather shoulder strap. Featuring Susanne's reverse-dyed brown leather paired with black. Cowhide. Closes at the top with a zipper. Interior is lined with remnant upholstery fabric. Inside is one slip pocket edged with leather and two additional pockets sized for a smart phone or wallet. Antique bronze hardware.

name: Soft Sparkle Tote
description:
The perfect bag to take you from day into evening. Soft, unlined with no extra fussiness (as in no pockets). Zip-top closure with hand-rouched flap detail.

Size: 12" x 15" x 1.5" (but soft, unstructured, and stuffable).
Strap drops 12"

Sueded cowhide finished in glimmery emerald green. Black cowhide detail.

Handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Crinkle Pleated Shoulder Bag
description:
Hand-rouched leather shoulder bag with inverted leather pleat. Lined in upholstery remnant fabric with two interior pockets. Interior fabrics will vary. Zip closure with flap and magnetic snap. 

Size: base 19", opening 13",  11" high, about 2" wide. Expandable.
Strap drops 11"

Distressed cowhide available in black, brown, or red.

Handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Rose Garden Satchel
description:
A garden of hand-coiled leather roses adorn both sides. Each bag is lined in vintage necktie fabric with leather side panels bonded with a complimentary color of leather on the interior. The lining fabrics will vary.

Two interior pockets. Closes with a super strong, self-guided magnetic snap. Four metal stud feet protect the base.

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in brown, black, or red.

Size 7" x 14.5" x 4"
Double leather handles drop 7"
Detachable leather shoulder strap drops 15"

Handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Crinkle Shoulder Bag with Flap
description:
The Crinkle Shoulder Bag with Flap features a front flap covered in permanent crinkles formed by hand-rouching the leather. Each bag is lined in vintage necktie fabric with leather side panels bonded with a complimentary color of leather on the interior. The lining fabrics will vary.

Two interior pockets. The bag closes with two very strong magnetic snaps under the flap. Four metal stud feet protect the bottom.

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in brown, black, red, or yellow.

Size 9" x 11" x 2.5".
Leather shoulder strap drops 14".

Willi Nilli bags are handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Three-Rose Shoulder Bag with Flap
description:
The Three-Rose Shoulder Bag with Flap features a cluster of three hand-coiled leather roses with two leather leaves on the front flap. Each bag is lined in vintage necktie fabric with leather side panels bonded with a complimentary color of leather on the interior. The lining fabrics will vary.

Two interior pockets. The bag closes with two very strong magnetic snaps under the flap. Four metal stud feet protect the bottom.

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in brown, black, or red.

Size 9" x 11" x 2.5".
Leather shoulder strap drops 14"

Willi Nilli bags are handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Crinkle Day Bag
description:
The Crinkle Day Bag features hand-rouched, permanent crinkles on the front, back, and bottom. 

The interior is lined in a lovely upholstery remnant fabric from Susanne's extensive fabric collection (fabrics will vary). The leather side panels are bonded on the interior with a complementary interior color. And, inside you'll find two pockets. The bag pulls closed with two self-guided, super-strong magnetic snaps.

Size: 9" x 14.5 x 5
Double leather handles drop: 15"

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in black, brown, or red.

Willi Nilli bags are handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Crinkle Clutch
description:
The Crinkle Clutch features a front flap covered in permanent crinkles formed by hand-rouching the leather. Each bag is lined in vintage necktie fabric with leather side panels bonded with a complimentary color of leather on the interior. The lining fabrics will vary.

One interior pocket. The bag closes with a very strong magnetic snap under the flap.

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in brown, black, or red.

Size 5.5" x 12" x 2.5"
Detachable leather strap drops 7.5"

Willi Nilli bags are handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Three-Rose Clutch
description:

One interior pocket. The bag closes with a very strong magnetic snap under the flap.

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in brown, black, or red.

Size 5.5" x 12" x 2.5"
Detachable leather strap drops 7.5"

Willi Nilli bags are handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Rose Garden Clutch
description:
The Rose Garden Clutch features a front flap adorned with a garden of hand-coiled leather roses. Each bag is lined in vintage necktie fabric with leather side panels bonded with a complimentary color of leather on the interior. The lining fabrics will vary.

One interior pocket. The bag closes with a very strong magnetic snap under the flap.

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in brown, black, red,  yellow, or pearlized platinum (the perfect color for a wedding!).

Size 5.5" x 12" x 2.5"
Detachable leather strap drops 7.5"

name: Crinkle Tote
description:
The Crinkle Tote features hand-rouched, permanent crinkles on the front, back, and bottom. 

The interior is lined in a lovely upholstery remnant fabric from Susanne's extensive fabric collection (fabrics will vary). The leather side panels are bonded on the interior with a complementary interior color. And, inside you'll find two pockets sized just right for a smart phone, and one pen sleeve. The bag pulls closed with two self-guided, super-strong magnetic snaps.

Size: 13" x 16.5 x 4.5
Double leather handles drop 12"

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in black, brown, or red.

Willi Nilli bags are handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.

name: Three-Rose Twist Tote
description:
The Three-Rose Twist Tote features a burst of leather with three hand-formed roses nestled in the "twist". Five metal stud feet protect the base. 

The interior is lined in lovely upholstery remnant fabric from Susanne's extensive fabric collection (interior fabrics will vary). Three interior pockets. The leather side panels are bonded on the interior with a complementary color.  The bag pulls closed with two self-guided, super-strong magnetic snaps.

Size: 13" x 16.5 x 4.5
Double straps drop 12"

The leather is distressed cowhide, available in black, brown, or red.

Willi Nilli bags are handmade to order; please allow 4-8 weeks for delivery.
